LanguageData.WorkManager.UpdateIntervalTooltip: How many times to update work priorities per in-game day
LanguageData.WorkManager.AssignMultipleDoctorsTooltip: Assign multiple doctors when there are multiple downed pawns
LanguageData.WorkManager.AssignAllWorkTypesTooltip: Assign every pawn all leftover work types with minimum priority to prevent idling
LanguageData.WorkManager.GlobalEnableTooltip: Enable automatic work type priority assignment system
LanguageData.WorkManager.GlobalDisableTooltip: Disable automatic work type priority assignment system
LanguageData.WorkManager.PawnEnableTooltip: Enable automatic work type priority assignment for pawn
LanguageData.WorkManager.PawnDisableTooltip: Disable automatic work type priority assignment for pawn
LanguageData.WorkManager.WorkTypeEnableTooltip: Enable automatic priority assignment for work type
LanguageData.WorkManager.WorkTypeDisableTooltip: Disable automatic priority assignment for work type
LanguageData.WorkManager.VerboseLoggingTooltip: Show mod execution details in log (only works when development mode is enabled)
